vulnerabilities.title: Prototype pollution vulnerability in 'libnested'
vulnerabilities.description: Prototype pollution vulnerability in 'libnested' versions 0.0.0 through 1.5.0 allows an attacker to cause a denial of service and may lead to remote code execution.

vulnerabilities.title: Prototype Pollution in libnested
vulnerabilities.description: The package libnested before 1.5.2 are vulnerable to Prototype Pollution via the set function in index.js. **Note:** This vulnerability derives from an incomplete fix for [CVE-2020-28283](https://security.snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-JS-LIBNESTED-1054930)
